member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.EdmExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for Edm classes

member.summary: Determines corresponding Edm type to C# CLR class

member.returns: Edm type associated with CLR type

member.summary: Returns EdmPrimitiveType equivalent of CLR type

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.EdmExtensions.GetEdmTypeReference(Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmModel,System.Type)
member.summary: Builds Edm type reference to corresponding CLR type
member.param: Model to look up equivalent Edm type
member.returns: IEdmTypeReference to the equivalent EdmType to the CLR type

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.EdmExtensions.EdmFullName(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the Edm formatted name of the CLR type
member.returns: Edm name of given CLR type

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.EdmExtensions.GetV4Definition(Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmModel,Microsoft.Data.Edm.IEdmType)
member.summary: Finds a V4 type definition by the name of a V3 type definition
member.returns: Equivalent V4 Type or null if not found

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.EdmExtensions.GetV4Definition(Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmModel,Microsoft.Data.Edm.IEdmTypeReference)
member.summary: Finds a V4 type reference definition by dereferencing a V3 type reference.
member.param: IEdmModel to search for the type name.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.EdmExtensions.ToEdmTypeReference(Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs type reference for the given IEdmType
member.param: Whether the type reference is permitted to be null

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.EdmExtensions.GetFullTypeName(Microsoft.Data.Edm.IEdmType)
member.summary: Attempts multiple casts on Data.Edm.IEdmType to reach derived classes and extract full name. Implementation taken (copy-pasted and primitiveType case commented) from OData V4 ExtensionMethods.
member.param: OData V3 type to extract name of

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.EdmExtensions.GetFullName(Microsoft.Data.Edm.IEdmSchemaElement)
member.summary: Handles specific case of extracting a name from Data.Edm.IEdmSchemaElement. Implementation taken (copy-pasted and primitiveType case commented) from OData V4 ExtensionMethods.
member.param: OData V3 IEdmSchemaElement to extract name of

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.EdmExtensions.TryGetInnerTypeForDelta(System.Type@)
member.summary: Try to return the inner type of a generic Delta.
member.param: in: The type to test; out: inner type of a generic Delta.
member.returns: True if the type was generic Delta; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.EdmExtensions.GetPrimitiveTypeReference(Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmPrimitiveType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines the kind of type, then returns appropriate concrete type reference to that primitive type.
member.param: a boolean to indicate whether the reference can take on a null value
member.returns: IEdmPrimitiveTypeReference to type, or null if type is of unknown type

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.ExceptionUtil
member.summary: Methods to assist in null checking and other auxiliary functions

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Filters.MigrationExceptionFilter.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Filters.MigrationExceptionFilter})
member.summary: Catches exceptions and puts them in the response body so that the client receives error messages.
member.param: Logger for server-side logging of exceptions

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Filters.MigrationExceptionFilter.OnException(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Filters.ExceptionContext)
member.summary: If an exception is thrown and not handled by a controller, handle it and put it in the response body as 500 error

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Filters.MigrationResourceFilter.OnResourceExecuted(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Filters.ResourceExecutedContext)
member.summary: When inner requests within batch requests are executed, add the appropriate content headers and match the content ID

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.ClrTypeCache
member.summary: This class was taken from OData v4 Asp Net library 7.1 so that the serializer and deserializer providers can determine the mapping between an OData type (IEdmTypeReference) and CLR type (Type)

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.DeserializationExtensions.SubstituteRequestStream(Microsoft.OData.ODataMessageReader,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary:
Replace the inner HTTP request stream with substituteStream using reflection.
The stream needs to be substituted because the request body needs to be translated before passed on to the base deserialization classes to take advantage of OData V4 model validation. Unfortunately, although it is guaranteed to exist, the message field is marked private in the ODataMessageReader, so reflection must be used to modify it.
member.param: ODataMessageReader which has not read yet.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.DeserializationExtensions.WalkTranslate(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmTypeReference)
member.summary: Walk the JSON body and format top level instance annotations (more complex annotations are unsupported) and change types that would be deserialized incorrectly by OData V4 formatters to types that will be deserialized correctly.
member.param: JToken root or child of JSON request body

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationActionPayloadDeserializer
member.summary: This customized deserializer handles translating V3 type properties in incoming function/action payloads.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationActionPayloadDeserializer.Read(Microsoft.OData.ODataMessageReader,System.Type,Microsoft.AspNet.OData.Formatter.Deserialization.ODataDeserializerContext)
member.summary: If the incoming request is a V3 request, this Read method extracts the JSON body of the request, transforms all V3 specific types to V4 compatible types (e.g. quoted longs to longs), and passed on to base class.
member.param: Contains incoming HTTP request and type information

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationActionPayloadDeserializer.TranslateActionPayload(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmAction)
member.summary: Action payloads are not Edm types, so they cannot be translated like resources are translated. To translate the action payload, we walk through each property and compare it to its parameter. For any properties that are V3 compatible only, we translate them. If they are not simple values (e.g., entities or collections), we can translate them using the same method used for translating resources.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationCollectionDeserializer
member.summary: Handles deserializing arrays of non-entities.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationCollectionDeserializer.ReadCollectionValue(Microsoft.OData.ODataCollectionValue,Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmTypeReference,Microsoft.AspNet.OData.Formatter.Deserialization.ODataDeserializerContext)
member.summary: Override this method to translate property values in v3 format to v4 format. We treat collections (arrays of non-entity/non-complex types) differently from resource sets because there is an accessible method to override that allows us to examine each value in the collection and convert it if necessary.
member.param: Context that contains model, state and HTTP request information

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationDeserializerProvider
member.summary: Implementation of DefaultODataDeserializerProvider that hardwires in customized migration deserializers. This doesn't use dependency injection so that users have a clean interface instead of injecting multiple deserializers, and also so that this formatter is guaranteed to use only migration deserializers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationDeserializerProvider.GetEdmTypeDeserializer(Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmTypeReference)
member.summary:
Returns the appropriate deserializer for the given IEdmType.
The structure of this method is copied from DefaultODataDeserializerProvider, however the difference is that the Migration deserializers are hardwired in (use them all or use none of them).
member.param: The edm type to obtain the deserializer for.
member.returns: The appropriate deserializer for the given edm type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationDeserializerProvider.GetODataDeserializer(System.Type,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest)
member.summary:
Gets the appropriate ODataDeserializer for a Type (not necessarily edm type)
This method is overidden to call the private GetODataDeserializerImpl in this class. The reason why it simply calls GetODataDeserializerImpl is because originally it was in the shared OData library between AspNet and AspNetCore. Since this extension only caters to OData v4 in AspNetCore, it no longer needs to be shared and can therefore be overridden.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationDeserializerProvider.GetODataDeserializerImpl(System.Type,System.Func{Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmModel})
member.summary:
Gets the appropriate ODataDeserializer for a Type, converting it into an Edm type if necessary.
This method was copied from DefaultODataDeserializerProvider, except instead of returning deserializers via DI, it directly returns deserializers so that the ActionPayloadDeserializer could be replaced with the ODataMigrationActionPayloadDeserializer, which is used if the incoming type is a set of parameters for an OData action.
member.param: Function to get IEdmModel (to delay evaluation of model)

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationInputFormatter
member.summary:
Input formatter that supports V3 conventions in request bodies.
Most of this code was copied from ODataInputFormatter in AspNetCore; the main difference is that instead of using DefaultODataDeserializerProvider, a customized ODataMigrationDeserializerProvider is used.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationInputFormatter.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.OData.ODataPayloadKind})
member.summary: Initialize the ODataMigrationInputFormatter and specify that it only accepts JSON UTF8/Unicode input
member.param: The types of payloads accepted by this input formatter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationInputFormatter.CanRead(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Formatters.InputFormatterContext)
member.summary: Determine if incoming request is specifically OData v3; if not, then use the next InputFormatter
member.returns: True if the incoming request is OData v3, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationInputFormatter.ReadRequestBodyAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Formatters.InputFormatterContext,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: If the request has OData v3 headers in it, then process using V3 deserializer provider. Otherwise, process as base class.
Read and deserialize incoming object from HTTP request stream.
member.param: Edm model to reference when validating.
HTTP request method that contains ODataPath.
Function to obtain appropriate edm deserializer.
Function to obtain appropriate deserialize for function payloads.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationResourceDeserializer
member.summary: This customized deserializer for resources will modify request bodies that represent OData entities to convert OData V3 request body conventions to V4 request body conventions (e.g. quoted longs to longs)

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationResourceDeserializer.Read(Microsoft.OData.ODataMessageReader,System.Type,Microsoft.AspNet.OData.Formatter.Deserialization.ODataDeserializerContext)
member.summary: If the request body is V3, preempts the base deserializer by first modifying the JSON request body, then swapping out the HTTP request stream with the modified body that can be successfully read by the base deserializer.
member.param: Context to track state and settings of deserialization

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Deserialization.ODataMigrationResourceDeserializer.GetEdmType(Microsoft.AspNet.OData.Formatter.Deserialization.ODataDeserializerContext,System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieves the Edm Type from the given type, using ODataDeserializerContext
member.param: Context with information about current EdmModel
The type to find an equivalent Edm type to

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMediaTypes
member.summary: Contains media types used by the OData formatter.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMigrationCollectionSerializer
member.summary: Customized serializer that converts V3 incompatible types to compatible types in collections

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMigrationOutputFormatter
member.summary: Output formatter that supports V3 conventions in response bodies

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMigrationOutputFormatter.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.OData.ODataPayloadKind})
member.summary: Initialize the ODataMigrationOutputFormatter and specify that it only accepts JSON UTF8/Unicode input
member.param: The types of payloads accepted by this output formatter.

member.summary: Check for the presence of OData v3 headers
member.returns: True if specifically V3 OData request

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMigrationOutputFormatter.WriteResponseBodyAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Formatters.OutputFormatterWriteContext,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Customized write method (derived from ODataOutputFormatter) which translates odata context and uses ODataMigration serializer provider
Read and serialize outgoing object to HTTP request stream.
member.param: Function to obtain payload serializer context.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMigrationOutputFormatter.GetBaseAddressInternal(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest)
member.summary: Internal method used for selecting the base address to be used with OData uris. If the consumer has provided a delegate for overriding our default implementation, we call that, otherwise we default to existing behavior below.
member.param: The HttpRequest object for the given request.
member.returns: The base address to be used as part of the service root; must terminate with a trailing '/'.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMigrationPrimitiveSerializer
member.summary: Converts primitive types that serialize differently in v3 (e.g., longs are serialized with quotes in v3)

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMigrationResourceSerializer
member.summary: Converts single resources to v3 compatible serialized format

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMigrationResourceSetSerializer
member.summary: Converts resource sets to v3 compatible serialized format Although ODataMigrationResourceSerializer is called through the provider, this resource set serializer calls ODataMigrationResourceSerializer.WriteObjectInline (not overridden) rather than .WriteObject, so there needs to be custom logic in the resource set serializer as well.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMigrationResourceSetSerializer.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNet.OData.Formatter.Serialization.ODataSerializerProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.Formatters.Serialization.ODataMigrationSerializerProvider
member.summary:
Implementation of DefaultODataSerializerProvider that hardwires the edm type serializer dispatch process. The ODataMigrationOutputFormatter creates a customized service provider to pass to this serializer provider which injects the default serializers for payloads, but for edm types, the function GetEdmTypeSerializer is hardcoded.
This is so that the migration serializers are not mixed with other injected serializers, which could lead to behavior that is difficult to debug.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.SerializationExtensions.SubstituteResponseStream(Microsoft.OData.ODataMessageWriter,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary:
Replace the inner HTTP response stream with substituteStream using reflection.
The stream needs to be substituted because the request body needs to be translated before passed on to the base deserialization classes to take advantage of OData V4 model validation. Unfortunately, although it is guaranteed to exist, the message field is marked private in the ODataMessageWriter, so reflection must be used to modify it.
member.param: ODataMessageWriter which has not written yet.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.SerializationExtensions.PreemptivelyTranslateResponseStream(Microsoft.OData.ODataMessageWriter,Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmTypeReference,System.Action{Microsoft.OData.ODataMessageWriter})
member.summary: Substitute the stream from the messageWriter before writing, then read out the substituted stream and translate, then write to the original response stream.
member.param: Type of object to be serialized
Writer's action to write to stream

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.SerializationExtensions.GetEdmType(Microsoft.AspNet.OData.Formatter.Serialization.ODataSerializerContext,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Determine and return the EdmType of given type given the SerializerContext.

member.returns: Equivalent edm type to given type

member.summary: Walk the JSON body and change outgoing V4 properties that would serialize in an unexpected way to properties that will serialize in a way understood by V3 OData clients.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator
member.summary: UriSegmentTranslator contains logic to translate every kind of V3 path segment into its corresponding V4 counterpart path segment.

member.summary: Initialize UriSegmentTranslator
member.param: v4 model is used to look up corresponding entities/etc. from v3 to create v4 segments

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.EntitySetSegment)
member.summary: Translates a V3 EntitySetSegment (e.g. "/Boxes") to a V4 EntitySetSegment

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.KeySegment)
member.summary: Translates a V3 KeySegment (e.g. "/Boxes(1)") to a V4 KeySegment

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.PropertySegment)
member.summary: Translates at V3 PropertySegment (e.g. "/Boxes(1)/Name") into a V4 PropertySegment

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.OperationSegment)
member.summary: Translates a V3 OperationSegment to V4 OperationSegment by locating all matching function imports in the v4 model and constructing a new V4 OperationSegment with all found operation segments.
member.returns: Equivalent V4 operation segment or operation import segment

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.OpenPropertySegment)
member.summary: Translates a V3 OpenPropertySegment into its V4 equivalent: a DynamicPathSegment.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Extensions.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.CountSegment)
member.summary: Translates V3 CountSegment to V4 CountSegment by simply returning the V4 CountSegment instance, which is what is needed in all cases.

member.summary: Translates a v3 ValueSegment (e.g. /Boxes(1)/Name/$value) into a v4 ValueSegment

member.summary: Translates V3 BatchSegment to V4 BatchSegment by simply returning the V4 BatchSegment instance, which is what is needed in all cases.
